channel.title: Volunteering on Savo's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Volunteering on Savo's Site

item.title: Head of Electronics
item.description: Oversee the development and production of novel electrical systems to aid in the operation of our boundary pushing vehicles

item.title: F!rosh Games Co-Chair
item.description: Organized and delivered a sporting event to over 1000 participants across 20 teams, coordinating with over 20 parties internal and external to the Orientation committee

item.title: F!rosh P!rank Co-Chair
item.description: Organized an hour of entertainment for around 1000 attendees across 10 rooms with unique schedules for each one
